scripts.cypress:test:uk: CYPRESS_baseUrl=https://www.test.bbc.com yarn run cypress:open --env 'env=test,TAGS=not @ignore and not @US'
scripts.cypress:test:regression: yarn delete:reports; TAGS='@Regression and not @ignore' CYPRESS_env=test CYPRESS_baseUrl=https://www.test.bbc.com yarn run cypress:tags; yarn report
scripts.cypress:stage:regression: yarn delete:reports; TAGS='@Regression and not @ignore' CYPRESS_env=test CYPRESS_baseUrl=https://www.stage.bbc.com yarn run cypress:tags; yarn report
scripts.cypress:live:regression: yarn delete:reports; TAGS='@Regression and not @ignore' CYPRESS_env=live CYPRESS_baseUrl=https://www.bbc.com yarn run cypress:tags; yarn report
scripts.cypress:test:record:regression: yarn delete:reports; TAGS='@Regression' CYPRESS_env=test CYPRESS_baseUrl=https://www.test.bbc.com yarn run cypress:tags --tag '@Regression' --record --key 370ae8c5-9007-4c7e-8d6f-4ef8e1913ad6; yarn report
scripts.cypress:headless:test: TAGS='@Regression and not @ignore' CYPRESS_env=test CYPRESS_baseUrl=https://www.test.bbc.com cypress run --headless
scripts.cypress:headless:localhost: TAGS='@Regression and not @ignore' CYPRESS_env=test CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost.bbc.com:3000 cypress run --headless
scripts.delete:reports: rm -rf test-results/cypress/JSON/* || true; rm -rf test-results/cypress/HTML/* || true; rm -rf cypress/videos/features/* || true
